preface.title: Acknowledgements
preface.para: First and foremost I wish to thank the creators of the free software libraries I use. Jalopy includes software developed by the following third parties:
Please refer to for a detailed list and the licensing terms.
Many thanks to all users and contributers who provided feedback, submitted bug reports, requested new features or even applied code.
A special thanks to Larry Hamel for the initial proof-reading of the manual.

And last but not least, I wish to thank the SourceForge crew for not only hosting the Jalopy website and providing the collaborative development infrastructure but also for their help and support getting things up and running.
